title: Data Analyst
description: We are looking for a data analyst skilled in Python, SQL, Excel, and data visualization tools like Power BI or Tableau. Knowledge of statistics and Pandas is a plus.

title: Machine Learning Engineer
description: Should have strong knowledge of machine learning, Python, Scikit-learn, TensorFlow, NumPy, and model deployment using Flask or FastAPI.

title: Frontend Developer
description: Proficient in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React, and frontend tools. Understanding of REST APIs and Git required.
